title: CHUNKY BOLOGNESE
directions: Add all ingredients to the mixer bowl, except for the mince.
Insert your simmering basket into the bowl and put your beef mince inside. Cook for 15 min/steaming temperature/speed 4/MC on.
Carefully break up the mince with a spatula, cook for a further 15-20 min/steaming temperature/speed 4/MC on. or until cooked.
Put your cooked mince into a serving bowl and pour your sauce over before serving.
ingredients: 1 tsp onion powder or 1 medium brown onion, peeled and halved.
1 tsp garlic powder or 1 garlic clove, peeled
20 g olive oil (omit for quick version)
20 g worcestershire sauce (optional, omit for p2)
